name: CrazyTrain
description:
Here, it's our submission for the gmtk2020-jam.
The goal is to plan the actions for three robots. They have to activate the shield (which spend energy) according to the event depicted on the right. They have to fetch coal and bring it to the energy room to recharge it and to the engine to travel 1km each turn. If a projectil hit a room, they need to repair the room. You have 60s second to plan the robot actions then the actions are applied.
You loose if your train take 6 damages and you win if you travel 10 kilometers.

Unfortunately, we didn't have time to fine-tune our game but basic gameplay is implemented.

Made by Boris, Solène and Thibaud
